dmca.title: Watchdog bloggin for God
dmca.body:
We are litigation counsel for [Private]and [Private], personally.

Our clients have brought to our attention the libellous postings on the website www.kingary.net. Please note that as the Internet Service Provider, which commercially benefits from hosting the website, you are equally liable for assisting, promoting or encouraging the dissemination, publication or broadcasting of the libellous postings found on www.kingary.net, specifically http://xcg.kingary.net.

We have been instructed to request that you immediately remove the website and undertake not to permit future websites of such a libellous nature, failing which our client will bring a court claim for damages and punitive awards, as well as seek costs on a substantial indemnity basis for recovery of the same.

As the aforementioned website can be viewed in Canada, making the libel actionable in this jurisdiction, we enclose our formal notice of our clients? intended action under the Libel and Slander Act, R.S.O 1990, c. L.12.

Govern yourself accordingly.
